com.quorum.tessera.nacl

Interface NaclFacade


  • public interface NaclFacade
    The API provided to the application that all implementation of this API module should extend

    Provides all function relating to encrypting and decrypting messages using public/private and symmetric keys.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • computeSharedKey

        SharedKey computeSharedKey(PublicKey publicKey,
                           PrivateKey privateKey)
        Compute the shared key from a public/private key combination The keys must be from different keysets. Providing the public key for the corresponding private key (and vice versa) results in an error

        The shared key for a public/private key combo is the same as if the private/public corresponding keys were provided. i.e. public1/private2 == private1/public2

        Parameters:
        publicKey - A public key from the first keyset
        privateKey - A private key from the second keyset
        Returns:
        The shared key for this key pair.

      • seal

        byte[] seal(byte[] message,
            Nonce nonce,
            PublicKey publicKey,
            PrivateKey privateKey)
        Encrypt a payload directly using the given public/private key pair for the sender/recipient
        Parameters:
        message - The payload to be encrypted
        nonce - A unique nonce for this public/private pair
        publicKey - The key from either sender or recipient
        privateKey - The other key from either sender or recipient
        Returns:
        The encrypted payload

      • open

        byte[] open(byte[] cipherText,
            Nonce nonce,
            PublicKey publicKey,
            PrivateKey privateKey)
        Decrypt a payload directly using the given public/private key pair for the sender/recipient
        Parameters:
        cipherText - The payload to be encrypted
        nonce - A unique nonce for this public/private pair
        publicKey - The key from either sender or recipient
        privateKey - The other key from either sender or recipient
        Returns:
        The encrypted payload

      • sealAfterPrecomputation

        byte[] sealAfterPrecomputation(byte[] message,
                               Nonce nonce,
                               SharedKey sharedKey)
        Encrypt a payload using the given public/private key pair for the sender/recipient
        Parameters:
        message - The payload to be encrypted
        nonce - A unique nonce for this public/private pair
        sharedKey - The shared key between the sender and recipient of the payload
        Returns:
        The encrypted payload

      • sealAfterPrecomputation

        default byte[] sealAfterPrecomputation(byte[] message,
                                       Nonce nonce,
                                       MasterKey masterKey)

      • openAfterPrecomputation

        byte[] openAfterPrecomputation(byte[] cipherText,
                               Nonce nonce,
                               SharedKey sharedKey)
        Decrypts a payload using the shared key between the sender and recipient
        Parameters:
        cipherText - The encrypted payload
        nonce - The nonce that was used to encrypt this payload
        sharedKey - The shared key for the sender and recipient
        Returns:
        The decrypted payload

      • randomNonce

        Nonce randomNonce()
        Generates a new random nonce of the correct size
        Returns:
        a Nonce containing random data to be used as a nonce

      • generateNewKeys

        KeyPair generateNewKeys()
        Generates a new public and private keypair
        Returns:
        A pair of public and private keys

      • createSingleKey

        SharedKey createSingleKey()
        Creates a single standalone key
        Returns:
        The randomly generated key

      • createMasterKey

        default MasterKey createMasterKey()
        Create a randomly generated MasterKey
        Returns:
        a random MasterKey

      • openAfterPrecomputation

        default byte[] openAfterPrecomputation(byte[] cipherText,
                                       Nonce cipherTextNonce,
                                       MasterKey masterKey)
        Decrypts a payload using the given MasterKey
        Parameters:
        cipherText - the ciphertext to decrypt
        cipherTextNonce - the nonce that was used to encrypt the payload
        masterKey - the key used to encrypt the payload
        Returns:
        the decrypted payload
        See Also:
        openAfterPrecomputation(byte[], Nonce, SharedKey)
